message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start.
I understand you want a larger share, but my offer is more balanced considering the decreasing value.
Considering the inflation, I'm being generous with 58-42 split.
This offer accounts for the inflation and is fair considering we are getting closer to the deadline.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
Time is running out. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical option at this point.
